# Class KnowledgeFactory

Factory class for creating knowledge systems (both local and remote) Handles the creation of knowledge systems based on provided configurations

##### Index

### Methods

create

## Methods

### `Static`create

  * create(  
config: [KnowledgeCreationConfig](/types/primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeCreationConfig),  
embedder?: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder),  
): Promise<[Knowledge](./primitives_knowledge_knowledge.Knowledge)>

Creates a Knowledge instance based on the provided configuration

#### Parameters

    * config: [KnowledgeCreationConfig](/types/primitives_knowledge_types.KnowledgeCreationConfig)

Configuration for knowledge system creation

    * `Optional`embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Optional text embedder for local knowledge systems

#### Returns Promise<[Knowledge](./primitives_knowledge_knowledge.Knowledge)>

A Knowledge instance

#### Throws

InworldError If creation fails
